note.description: Tell us what you think and help us to improve the service.
note.title: Try the service

delete.label: Delete comment
delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete the comment?

report.description: The website administrator will be notified of inappropriate content.
report.label: Report inappropriate comment
report.title: Report inappropriate comment

comments.description: You can comment on this content when logged in. Comments are made anonymously. The comments are visible to all users. Do not share personal or other private information in the comments.
comments.title: Comment on content

error-boundary.session-expired: Your session has expired. You must log in to the service again or use the service without logging in.
error-boundary.title: An error occurred
error-boundary.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. This may be due to a loss of network connection or a service error.

external-link: The link leads outside the service

feedback.error: Failed to send feedback. Please try again later.

footer-handled.ohjaajan: Guidance practitioners section at the KEHA centre,
footer-handled.osaamispolkuni: My Competency Path at the Finnish National Agency for Education,
footer-handled.tietopalvelu: Information service, entire service and other feedback at the Ministry of Education and Culture.

feedback.footer-info-1: When you send feedback, we save the service status information, such as the view from which the feedback was sent. Status information will not be disclosed to third parties. Feedback is used for service development and voluntarily provided contact information is used to respond to feedback.
feedback.footer-info-heading: Depending on the section, the feedback is processed as follows:
feedback.footer-privacy-heading: Read more in the privacy statements of the feedback processors:
feedback.intro-1: Please provide feedback on the service or report a technical problem. This way, you will help us in service development.
feedback.intro-2: If you report an incident, it would help us if you were as specific as possible.
feedback.intro-privacy: Do not enter any personal information, such as personal identity number or health information, in the feedback. Please fill in all the fields so that we can process your feedback.

links.keha: KEHA Centre's customer and advisory services privacy statement
links.okm: Ministry of Education and Culture's privacy statement
links.oph: Finnish National Agency for Education’s data protection policy

feedback.section-question: Which section does your feedback concern?
feedback.success: Thank you for your feedback! Your feedback will help us to improve the service.
feedback.title: Give feedback
feedback.type-question: What kind of feedback would you like to give?

footer.cooperation-title: The Competency Path has been implemented in cooperation by the following parties
footer.feedback-content: We want to develop Competency Path to better meet your specific needs. Give us feedback and we will take it into account in our development work.
footer.feedback-title: Tell us what you thought about the service!
footer.funding-title: The project is funded by the EU's Recovery and Resilience Facility (RRF).

logos.tem-label: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment

footer.more-info-description: Are you worried about data protection or the use of artificial intelligence in the service? Below, you will find a summary of general information about the service and its use.

more-info-links.ai-usage: About the use of artificial intelligence

footer.more-info-title: Do you want to know more about Competency Path?

home.best-matching: You may also be interested in
home.card-1-content: In the guidance practitioner section, you will find information, methods and materials to strengthen your own competence to support your career guidance work. The service compiles content from different information sources.
home.card-2-content: Information on the field of guidance and its development
home.card-4-content: Materials for the development of guidance skills
home.favorites-content: As a logged-in user, you can save service content as favourites, making it easier to find and share it in the future. To save a favourite, click the heart icon on the content card.

log-in-to-the-service-button: Log in to the guidance practitioner section
log-in-to-the-service-content: After logging in, you can join discussions on the content, save favourites and adapt the content shown according to your interests. The service uses Suomi.fi authentication.
log-in-to-the-service-title: Log in to the guidance practitioner section
login-for-favorites: Log in to the guidance practitioner section to save your favourites and access them later.

no-match.description: The page you are looking for could not be found or the link has expired. Check the address, open the menu or go to the front page.
no-match.title: Oops! Page could not be found

details.ingress: You can complete your information below. Completing the information is optional. When commenting on the content of the guidance practitioner section, your name or other information will not be visible to other users of the service.

interest.description: When you select keywords that interest you, we can offer you more targeted content in the service. You can also see all other content offered in the service. Your selection will be automatically saved.
interest.title: My interests

introduction.description: Tell us where you work so we can understand who uses the service. This allows us to develop the service and its content to better meet the needs of users. Your place of work will not be visible to other users and will not be used for any other purpose than statistical purposes.
introduction.title: Place of work

details.title: Personal Info

favorites.description: The content you have saved as favourites can be found here. You can save favourites by clicking the heart icon next to content highlights and content pages. Click the heart icon again to remove a saved favourite.
favorites.no-favorites: You have not saved any favourites yet. You can explore the content in the following sections:
favorites.no-tags: You can filter your saved content based on keywords.
favorites.title: Favourites

front.data-processing-info: The processing of data is based on the Act on the national competence database for continuous learning. Read more about the grounds for data processing in our <Link>privacy policy</Link>.
front.greeting: Hello {{etunimi}} - welcome to the guidance practitioner's profile!
front.list-1-item-1: add your personal data so that we can serve you better
front.list-1-item-2: save content of the guidance practitioner section as favourites by clicking the heart icon
front.list-2-item-1: send your suggestions for content to be added to the service
front.list-2-item-2: discuss with other guidance practitioners in content-related comment chains.
front.logged-in-features-intro: Once logged in, you can also
front.profile-description: In the guidance practitioner profile, you can
front.title: Guidance practitioner profile
front.you-are-signed-in: You are logged in to the guidance practitioner profile. The guidance practitioner profile serves as a storage and management location for your own information in the Guidance practitioner section of Competency Path.

login-page.auth-description: The service uses Suomi.fi authentication. We only use your data in anonymised form in order to create an overview of the users.
login-page.benefits-description: By logging in to the service, you can also
login-page.description: By logging in to the service, you will have access to a personal guidance practitioner profile and additional features for using the Guidance practitioner section.
login-page.list-1-item-1: Under “Personal info”, you can, for example, indicate your interests so that we can offer you more targeted content.
login-page.list-1-item-2: Under Favourites, you can save the content of the service, making it easier to find and share it in the future.
login-page.list-1-item-3: Under Settings you can download or delete your profile.
login-page.list-2-item-1: suggest new content to be added to the service
login-page.list-2-item-2: comment on and discuss the content of the service with other guidance practitioners
login-page.logged-in-features: Additional features for a logged in user
login-page.profile-description: When you log in to the Guidance practitioner section for the first time, we will create a blank profile for you. Your profile will be retained for as long as you need it.
login-page.title: Create your own guidance practitioner profile

delete-profile.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your guidance practitioner profile?
delete-profile.description: You can permanently delete your entire guidance practitioner profile and all information stored in it. The deletion cannot be reversed. Please note that deleting the guidance practitioner profile will not affect any created competence profile, if any, or the information therein. If you also want to delete the competence profile, you need to do so via the competence profile settings in your Competency Path.
delete-profile.title: Delete guidance practitioner profile

download.description: You can download all the data stored in your guidance practitioner profile to your device. This refers to information that you have shared in the Guidance practitioner section, as well as information that we have collected about your activities. The data is generated in a machine-readable JSON format. JSON is a simple and lightweight open standard file format for data transfer and storage.
download.title: Download guidance practitioner profile

preferences.ingress: On this page, you can download your profile data for yourself or delete your profile completely.
preferences.title: Settings

search.description: You can search for the content of the Guidance practitioner section using the search function. You can influence the visibility of the results by selecting a keyword that interests you from the list.
search.label: Search the Guidance practitioner section
search.title: Search in Guidance practitioner sections

suggest-new-content.content-guide: Among other things, suggested content is expected to be related to lifelong guidance, career management skills or the development of the professional skills of the guidance practitioner. The content must be lawful, in Finnish or Swedish, openly available and free of charge, and not infringe copyright. The suitability is assessed separately with respect to each suggested content.
suggest-new-content.description: Have you used a guidance method that is not available in the service? Interested in adding information about a theme? Use the attached form to suggest any content you think is missing from the service.
suggest-new-content.description-label: Describe the content in your own words and explain why it would be useful
suggest-new-content.email-label: Please provide your contact details so that we can contact you if necessary.
suggest-new-content.error: Failed to submit content suggestion. Please try again later.

errors.description: Enter a description of the content
errors.link: Enter a valid link, e.g. https://www.osaamispolku.fi

suggest-new-content.footer-info-1: When you submit a content suggestion, the suggestion is saved. Providing an email address is optional, but if you provide your email address, the information will be stored. The data will not be disclosed to third parties. Content suggestions are processed in the KEHA centre.
suggest-new-content.keha-privacy-policy-href-link-text: KEHA Centre’s Privacy policy for customer and advisory services
suggest-new-content.success: Thank you for your content suggestion!
suggest-new-content.title: Content suggestion

suggest-new-content-for-the-service: Suggest new content for the service?
suggest-new-content-for-the-service-cont:
Have you used a guidance method that is not available in the service, for example?
Suggest any content that you think is missing from the service.
